channel.title: Languages
channel.description: Hey, can someone help me. When I am viewing pages i get this sometimes it doesn't support the languages. It either shows up as ???? or [][][] and stuff like that. How can i make it so I can see like chinese and stuff

item.title: Languages
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

View > Character Encoding > Auto Detect > Then pick one.

Read full topic
